text: Do you ever donate to worthy causes? I want to tell you today about one of my favorite charities, Save the Children
yes definitly i am donate in save the children
That's great. I love this group because they help millions of children worldwide and do a great job of making sure my donations are actually used to help children.
nice i like this group for many children save in the world
Yes they work both in the US and abroad
yes i am live in us
Great me too. Here, they work on advocacy, education, and help children after emergency situations occur.
yes i education help for the children.
I agree. They lead Head Start and Early Head Start programs in this country which really ensure that kids get a great start in their educations
yes definitly develop for education
It's amazing to me that this organization reaches 120 countries around the world. That's a lot of children they are helping!
very intresting
Yes they are such a great charity that they have won many awards for their efforts
i have no award in the group.so i have like many children save in our life
Ok. Did you know that they recently went to Hawaii to help kids after the hurricane landed?
yes i help to kids
Yes, that's great. I loved that they set up shelters that were child friendly because t's so hard for kids to be away from home like that
yes my home in 3 childrens i take for in the life

Great. Now that our chat is over, I need to ask, "How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment."
